channel.title: Swedish Tech Events

item.title: 2021-06-30 19:00 Serverless Essentials - Örnsköldsvik Developer Meetup

item.title: 2021-08-25 19:00 Using Blockchain technology for a more sustainable and transparent world - Örnsköldsvik Developer Meetup
item.description: The last Wednesday of every month we invite you to a meetup at HouseBe Örnsköldsvik. This time we'll learn from Mats Hälldahl, who is the National Blockchain Lead Sweden at Atea, how we can use blockchain technology to build the transparent and resilient solutions of the futur...

item.title: 2021-06-15 17:00 #tredjetisdagen
item.description: Om det som är viktigt. Det brukar kretsa kring internet på något sätt, men det beror ju mest på att internet är överallt. // About what's important. Usually it will evolve around the internet in some way, but that's because internet is everywhere.
